title: Riot has crossed the line.
body: Taric's cleavage is unacceptable for League of Legends. It's inappropriate ~~and distracts me from playing this game properly.~~ Please ~~don't~~ remove it for the sake of our innocence.

replies.body:
This is the second best thing ever to happen to League.

Right after Pentakill Morde's glorious pecs.
http://orig00.deviantart.net/be7a/f/2014/149/e/2/mordekaiser_pentakill_by_aaa_nymphea-d7k9h7j.jpg
Why did I know the ~~Lord of Death~~ Iron Revenant was going to be involved in this. Special interaction: Reduces the armor of all nearby enemies by 1 when Pentakill Morde/Taric are together.
Can you feel the botlane synergy?
Heartseeker Varus + Taric = SHIP IT
{{champion:81}} {{item:3070}}
This is becoming Soap Opera... So who's dating who?

Lux thinks Ezrael Likes her, Ezrael is blind as a bat, and Taric loves anyone whose young, and male. The less clothes the better.  He Loves Ezrael, but he also loves Cupid Varus' Sweet chest.

This clarify things?

EDIT- I should have said 'Ezrael can't find a map'
Lux loves Garen, but Garen doesn't love her back, and she has to keep her lust secret. (I spend way to much time doing *ahem* research)
Um ew, Lux and garen are BROTHER AND SISTER.
That's why she has to keep it a secret.

How could you forget This magnificent chest?

http://lol.esportspedia.com/w/images/thumb/f/f4/Braum_0.jpg/200px-Braum_0.jpg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KOgJPV9BG0U
I can't wait to see Armor of the Fifth Age Taric with all of this.
Me either (•̀ᴗ•́)
How many people have you taken for saying your name?

> [{quoted}](name=Stormfather,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NsgME9sE,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T20:03:48.142+0000)
>
> How many people have you taken for saying your name?

You're mistaken. I think the name you're referring to is Candleja---
Baited.
I applaud you my friend
https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1890877385/Candlejack2.png
Old Taric was simply fabulous. This glorious specimen is fabulous incarnate.

I have mained Taric since S1. I approve this message
{{champion:44}}

level 21...

http://i.imgur.com/fmqYV53.png[/img]

his chest in his el tigre skin makes me feel like my cleavage is insignificant and that hurts my self-esteem. but i still love braum <3

UNACCEPTABLE. How dare he look differen't from me. This is sexist on all levels. I don't have a chizzled jaw and cut pecs. We need more body types of males MORE. Every male is the same. Pecs six pack and ripped tri's. How dare he look appealing in a fantasy game.

Need a champ you can identify with?  Here:

>
> get your sjw crap out of here.  stop whining that like 2 people are unhappy with new taric and now it's apparently sexist.  he's beautiful, and i support the sexualization of all characters, male and female (even though i gotta say i like the female ones way more, everybody deserves their fanservice)

Are you really that mental. My whole post is a play on feminism and sexualization. My post is literally sarcasm. I thought that was pretty clear.

> [{quoted}](name=SexySoapTurtle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=NsgME9sE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-04-04T19:25:29.920+0000)

and then there was gragas
Why are you being downvoted? Do people not recognize sarcasm? Or do they just read the first word, downvote, and move on?

THIS IS DEGRADING
FIRST YOU SEXUALIZE WOMEN
AND NOW MEN?
YOU MONSTERS
 pls dont take this seriously.
Obligatory "Taric can have a cleavage but Graves can't have a fucking cigar"-comment

It's particularly unreasonable given that Taric is clearly...

SMOKIN'!

...I hate myself.

We have to get rid of that open shirt. WON'T SOMEBODY PLEASE THINK OF THE CHILDREN! WE CAN'T SHOW SKIN IN THIS GAME!

And those pecs and muscles set a TOTALLY unreasonable body standard. As a male gamer, I feel totally underrepresented by this unachievable body type. It's (insert current year!)! WHY DO WE KEEP LETTING GAME COMPANIES GET AWAY WITH THIS?!

/s 


On a serious note, I think it looks awesome. Was not expecting Taric to turn into Fabio, but the splash art is absolutely...Outrageous. In a good way.
Expecting Anita Trollkesian make a video about League of Legends for 50,000$.
Taric's cape is a "strategic butt covering" after all.
Implying she knows how to make videos anymore. We'd see a passive aggressive tweet, at _best_.
And even then she'll need to gather 1k$ to make the tweet ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
A small contribution of 200k to make a "Extraordinary women daring to tweet passive-aggressively."
As far as I'm concerned, they can keep crossing the line in this direction c:
Sorry OP. I didn't read your post. I got lost in Taric's eyes.
#Chestgate

I don't believe in censorship, I believe in equality.

Cleavage for all!
Can we bring back Urgot's Nipples?
6.5/10. Took me a couple seconds to realize you are trolling. The strike-through text gave it away.
